pr_title: Fix hard deleter bug when the startToken is journal-based token

timeline.bodyText: This test is good, after verifying HardDelete doesn't move token forward, can we also verify calling pruneHardDeleteRecoveryRange should clear hardDeleteRecoveryRange?
timeline.author: jsjtzyy

replies.bodyText: This is already done. Below I call persistAndAdvanceStartTokenSafeToPersist so trigger the prune and verify that the hardDeleteRecoveryRange is cleared.
replies.author: justinlin-linkedin

timeline.message: Fix hard deleter bug when the startToken is journal-based token
